Title: The Castle
Writer: Franz Kafka (novel), Rudolf Noelte, Maximilian Schell
Actors: Maximilian Schell, Cordula Trantow, Trudik Daniel, Friedrich Maurer
Plot: A man comes to a small village to begin his new job as an attendant at the nearby castle. But everybody in the village claims that he surely must be mistaken, there is no need for an attendant at the castle.
